abstract: Wal-Mart chose the Martin Agency and MediaVest five weeks after overturning decisions to hire the Draft FCB Group as the lead agency to create ads.
snippet: Wal-Mart chose the Martin Agency and MediaVest five weeks after overturning decisions to hire the Draft FCB Group as the lead agency to create ads.
lead_paragraph: For the third time in less than three months, Wal-Mart Stores has made major decisions affecting the advertising agencies that handle its giant marketing assignments.

headline.main: Wal-Mart Chooses Ad Agencies Yet Again
headline.print_headline: Wal-Mart Chooses Ad Agencies Yet Again
